devdoc.author: Roger Wu (https://github.com/roger-wu)
devdoc.details: OPTIONAL functions for a dividend-paying token contract.

params._owner: The address of a token holder.

returns._0: The amount of dividend in wei that `_owner` has earned in total.

params._owner: The address of a token holder.

returns._0: The amount of dividend in wei that `_owner` can withdraw.

params._owner: The address of a token holder.

returns._0: The amount of dividend in wei that `_owner` has withdrawn.

devdoc.title: Dividend-Paying Token Optional Interface

accumulativeDividendOf(address).notice: View the amount of dividend in wei that an address has earned in total.

withdrawableDividendOf(address).notice: View the amount of dividend in wei that an address can withdraw.

withdrawnDividendOf(address).notice: View the amount of dividend in wei that an address has withdrawn.
